name: RGB Pigs
description:
Survive an onslaught of demon pigs in a world where you must toggle your flashlight's colour to tell friend from foe.

You find yourself trapped in the dark, surrounded by both evil demon pigs out for blood and harmless friendly pigs. You are armed with a shotgun and a flashlight with three colour settings: red, green and blue. Unfortunately for you the pigs come in different colours too, and without changing your light's colour it will be impossible to tell friend from foe...

Accidentally shooting a friendly pig will increase your insanity level, causing more demon pigs to appear.

How long will you survive?

Controls:

  • WASD - move around
  • Mouse - look around
  • Left click - shoot
  • Right click - change flashlight colour

This is the first game I have released, built over a couple of weeks in Godot Engine. I have open sourced it on GitHub under the MIT license here: https://github.com/mattmarch/rgbPigs
